--create topic testtopic;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source test_source_1(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 tinyint,
    col2 int,
    col3 double,
    col4 decimal(10, 2),
    col5 varchar,
    col6 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        "k.k0",
        "v.v1",
        "v.v2",
        "v.v3",
        "v.v4",
        "v.v5",
        "v.v6"
    )
    properties = (
    )
);
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_1 as select * from test_source_1;
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;

-- test empty source/mv;
create source test_source_2(
    col0 bigint,
    col1 tinyint,
    col2 int,
    col3 double,
    col4 decimal(10, 2),
    col5 varchar,
    col6 timestamp(6),
    primary key (col0)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "testtopic",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        "k.k0",
        "v.v1",
        "v.v2",
        "v.v3",
        "v.v4",
        "v.v5",
        "v.v6"
    )
    properties = (
    )
);
0 rows returned
create materialized view test_mv_2 as select * from test_source_2;
0 rows returned

select * from test_source_2 order by col0;
|col0|col1|col2|col3|col4|col5|col6|
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_2 order by col0;
|col0|col1|col2|col3|col4|col5|col6|
0 rows returned

select col0, col1, col2, col3, col4, col5, col6 from test_source_2 order by col0;
|col0|col1|col2|col3|col4|col5|col6|
0 rows returned
select col0, col1, col2, col3, col4, col5, col6 from test_mv_2 order by col0;
|col0|col1|col2|col3|col4|col5|col6|
0 rows returned

-- TODO test order by with multiple columns;

drop materialized view test_mv_2;
0 rows returned
drop source test_source_2;
0 rows returned

drop materialized view test_mv_1;
0 rows returned
drop source test_source_1;
0 rows returned

--delete topic testtopic;
